ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(ISBLANK(Customer_ID__c)),
OR(
LEN(Customer_ID__c) <> 11,
NOT(REGEX(Customer_ID__c, "^[A-Z]{2}-[0-9]{8}$")),
NOT(BEGINS(Customer_ID__c, Billing_Country_Code__c & "-"))
)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Oh snap! Make sure the format is 'XX-NNNNNNNN' where X is the 2-character billing country code and N is an 8-digit number.
